summary: A suite of unit tests that verify the XPO trainer's capability to train models under various configurations, including parameter-efficient fine-tuning, use of a reference model, custom PEFT settings, and the judge-training workflow.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the XPO trainer implementation to ensure reliable reinforcement learning from human feedback pipelines, especially when employing efficient fine-tuning and customizable components.
